# mirascope.core.xai.call_response_chunk

<ApiType type="Module" />

This module contains the `XAICallResponseChunk` class.

<Info title="Usage">

[Streams](/docs/mirascope/learn/streams#handling-streamed-responses)

</Info>

## Module Attributes

| Name | Type | Description |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- |
| XAICallResponseChunk |  | A simpler wrapper around `OpenAICallResponse`.

Everything is the same except the `cost` property, which has been updated to use
xAI's cost calculations so that cost tracking works for non-OpenAI models. |

## Classes

### XAICallResponseChunk

<ApiType type="Class" />

A simpler wrapper around `OpenAICallResponse`.

Everything is the same except the `cost` property, which has been updated to use
xAI's cost calculations so that cost tracking works for non-OpenAI models.

**Bases:** OpenAICallResponseChunk
